content.body: Hi Jesse can you share an agenda for tomorrow's TC39 Numerics call?
content.formatted_body: Hi Jesse can you share an agenda for tomorrow's TC39 Numerics call?

content.body: Also does anyone still need to be added to the Google Group? I don't see everyone in this channel in the group. https://groups.google.com/a/chromium.org/g/tc39-numerics
that looks like a great suggestion -- let's talk about that
Chris de Almeida: I tried editing the Google Calendar JS Numerics item but it seems I can't -- could you please add Mikhail, Ujjwal, Jordan, Romulo, Magnus, Dan, and Nicolo?
content.formatted_body: Chris de Almeida: I tried editing the Google Calendar JS Numerics item but it seems I can't -- could you please add Mikhail, Ujjwal, Jordan, Romulo, Magnus, Dan, and Nicolo?

content.body: ah, I see -- digging in to that group, I still see some people missing. I'll try adding them
For today's agenda, could we also discuss the details of banning bare decimal objects in Intl formatters?
Bah, it looks like I'd failed to get the recurring Numerics call on my calendar, and missed it today; apologies.
